comment.author: 70328495@N06
comment._content: I Turned up that bird while on Midway

comment.author: 89353651@N06
comment._content: Flew as a flight tech (in-flight electronic repair) on that and many other planes assigned to AEWBARRONPAC during 1963-1964 time frame.  Midway deployment with high anticipation of return to BP.  Great picture and great memories!

comment.author: 20214151@N00
comment._content: Served as a radar repair technician (AT2) and worked on the equipment in this plane and others from 1959 to 1961 while a part of the AEWBARRONPAC at both Barbers Point Naval Station, Hawaii and Midway Island. Lots of memories seeing these pictures.

comment.author: 90058881@N04
comment._content: Flew out of Midway as radioman
